Body:
with expected_protocol(ik.generic_scpi.SCPIFunctionGenerator, ['VOLT:OFFS?',
    'VOLT:OFFS 4.321000e-01'], ['+1.234000E+01'], repeat=2) as fg:
    assert fg.offset == 12.34 * u.V
    fg.offset = 0.4321 * u.V
    assert fg.channel[0].offset == 12.34 * u.V
    fg.channel[0].offset = 0.4321 * u.V
